GFF Tigrinya-Eritrean Lexical Model

This lexical model is intended for use with the Tigrinya-Eritrean Keyman Keyboard on mobile devices, see: https://keyman.com/keyboards/gff_tigrinya_eritrea/

Please report any problems by creating an issue ticket at the project's GitHub repository: https://github.com/keymanapp/lexical-models/issues
